channel.title: Easter Event 2011
channel.description:
So what do you guys think?
This time it looks like they haven't put much effort and was this an easter event? Weird.. no bunny, no eggs this time, it was all about spring and winter.
Did it in like 15 minutes.

item.title: Easter Event 2011
item.dc:creator: @nacional nacional
item.description:
@nacional wrote:

I’m sure some players are qualified for the 10 years cape, not many though.

Also yes i had some many accounts I made for low lvl pking, but I lost/forgot them.

Read full topic

item.title: Easter Event 2011
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

RSC was is 2001, right? I didn’t really play, so I wouldn’t know
However, I remember jagex saying awhile ago they couldn’t have the 10 year cape because it hasn’t been 10 years yet.

I think I have 2 accounts in line for that cape too
I probably should have like 12, I used to make so many accounts
But I don’t remember the username or passwords to any of them

Read full topic

item.title: Easter Event 2011
item.dc:creator: @nacional nacional
item.description:
@nacional wrote:

[quote=“Rich, post:25, topic:391650”]Afaik the developer posted on the High Level Forums saying they should be out around early May,

And it was said that they’ll probably release a 10 year veteran cape next year, they’re just releasing the 5 year veteran cape for now.[/quote]
Oh ok, wished they would hurry up and release the 10 year one, I don’t remember when I started though.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @EMINEM_BEAST EMINEM BEAST™
item.description:
@EMINEM_BEAST wrote:

Crap, the account I’m currently using was created in 08, my main account which was created in 06 got hacked along time ago…
So no veteran cape for me…

item.title: Easter Event 2011
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

reyx7:

I can’t wait for the veteran cape to come out so I can seperate myself from the people that will be wearing those easter, christmas and holloween items from 2010 and 2011.

This. Been playing on the same account for 5-6 years.

Its a cape coming, one of the capes of distinction, and i cant wait to see all those cocky 9 year olds who have been playing for only a wihle think they are all that, and cant get it.
Yep.
Better than a phat.
TAKES 5 YEARS TO GET!

Read full topic

item.title: Easter Event 2011
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

Spades:

They half assed the shit out of it, you had to chop down 2 evil tree’s, and the Inspect thing was glitched, it’s stuck at 5% health, so you don’t know how much longer it’s going to take. It’s a stupid event. They spent my guess 2 days making it at the most. It was horrible. Not a lot of dialogue, they re-used NPC’s. They didn’t even make new ones…

they’ve been doing that for a while now

Read full topic

item.title: Easter Event 2011

item.description:

It’s a stupid event. They spent my guess 2 days making it at the most. It was horrible. Not a lot of dialogue, they re-used NPC’s. They didn’t even make new ones…

item.title: Easter Event 2011
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“Mr Mopar, post:7, topic:391650”][quote author=drubrkletern link=topic=488816.msg3573774#msg3573774 date=1303254480]
Eh, the only good thing is every tree you kill in the event area, you get 2 charges on your tiara thing (which one depends on which area you kill them in) and each charge teleports you to a spirit tree in the world from anywere.

I did it as soon as rs was back online

In the event, those trees are so hard to kill though, the first time, we had like 100 people, at least half of them 99 wc, and it took like 30 minutes to kill.
[/quote]
it took me and like 5 other people 5-10 minutes…[/quote]
Im serious!

Well not 30 minutes, thats an exaggeration, but it did take at least like 10-13 minutes, and we did have like 40 people or so, maybe the more people, the harder it gets? (No pun intended on that)

Read full topic
